stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram

properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the Diagram.
properties.title: Name

properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.
properties.title: Documentation
properties.description_de: Der Modellierer kann weiteren Text zur Dokumentation des Diagramms einf체gen.

properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.
properties.title: Version

properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.
properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description_de: Sprache, mit welcher im Diagramm verwendete Ausdr체cke beschrieben sind.

properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.
properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description_de: Sprache, mit welcher im Diagramm verwendete Abfragen beschrieben sind.

properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.
properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description_de: Datum an dem das Diagramm erstellt wurde.

properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.
properties.title: ModificationDate

properties.description: Identification to distinct different process definitions. Multiple versions of a process with the same key can be deployed. The key:name combination must remain exactly the same for all deployed versions.
properties.title: Key

stencils.description: A task is a unit of work - the job to be performed.
stencils.title: Task

properties.description: Typ der Aktivit채t
properties.title: ActivityType

properties.description: Defines the number of tokens that must be generated from the activity
properties.title: CompletionQuantity
properties.description_de: Legt die Anzahl der Token fest, die von der Aktivit채t generiert werden m체ssen.

properties.description: id of the person to which this task must be assigned
properties.title: Assignee

properties.description: resolves to a comma separated list of groupIds. All the people in the groups will be candidates for this task.
properties.title: Candidate Groups

properties.description: resolves to a comma separated list of userIds. All the users will be candidates for this task.
properties.title: Candidate Users

stencils.description_de: Eine Task ist eine Arbeitseinheit. Sie repr채sentiert die Aufgabe, die zu tun ist.

stencils.description: When splitting, it routes the sequence flow to exactly one of the outgoing branches based on conditions. When merging, it awaits one incoming branch to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.title: Data-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway

properties.description: Script that will be evaluated in the specified expression language.
properties.title: Expression

properties.description: The language in which expression is to be evaluated.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: Fully qualified classname of the handler implementation class.
properties.title: Exclusive Handler

stencils.description_de: Bei einer Verzweigung wird der Sequenzfluss abh채ngig von Verzweigungsbedingungen zu genau einer ausgehenden Kante geleitet. Bei einer Zusammenf체hrung wird auf eine der eingehenden Kante gewartet, um den ausgehenden Sequenzfluss zu aktivieren.

stencils.description: When used to split the sequence flow, all outgoing branches are activated simultaneously. When merging parallel branches it waits for all incoming branches to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.title: Parallel Gateway
stencils.description_de: Wenn der Sequenzfluss verzweigt wird, werden alle ausgehenden Kanten simultan aktiviert. Bei der Zusammenf체hrung wird auf alle eingehenden Kanten gewartet, bevor der ausgehende Sequenzfluss aktiviert wird.

description: A subset of BPMN 1.2 for execution with jPDL 4
title: JBoss jBPM Process (jPDL 4)
